fixes.name: Change Initial Cash USD (abs)
fixes.dax_expression: ABS('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T]) - ABS('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T -1])
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau ABS(...) subtraction to DAX, and transformed column references to 'TableName'[ColumnName] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation depends on calculated fields that reference Tableau parameters (e.g., Use Custom Date / End Date). Per rules, any calculation that references parameters must be created as a measure.
